title: O'Neill Womens Supertech Neoprene Capri Leggings
features: The thin, superlight 1mm neoprene protects against wind chill, UV exposure, and chilly water in the lake, ocean, or pool. Wear over your swimsuit, or pair with our exclusive Bahia Full Zip Wetsuit Jacket for more warmth and protection.
Performance fit: form-fitting, designed to fit snug like a second skin to insulate in the water.
Flatlock stitched seams for comfort and durability. 1mm UltraFlex DS Neoprene.
Double-layer wide lycra waistband with integrated tuck pocket to hold a key or small music player. Internal stretch drawstring to customize the fit around the waist.
Raw edge lower hem for easy stretch and smooth fit on your calves.
description: O'Neill Wetsuits's Bahia Series brings modern materials and design together to produce great-fitting, great-looking wetsuits that perform for active water athletes. Now exclusively developed by iSnorkel in partnership with O'Neill Wetsuits, we bring you the Supertech Capri length leggings for women in an extended size range with unique features designed for the active athlete or recreational fitness enthusiast. The thin, superlight neoprene protects against wind chill, UV exposure, and chilly water in the lake, ocean, or pool. Performance fit: form-fitting, designed to fit snug like a second skin to insulate in the water. Flatlock stitched seams for comfort and durability. 1mm neoprene body. Double-layer wide lycra waistband with integrated tuck pocket to hold a key or small music player. Raw edge lower hem for easy stretch and smooth fit on your calves. Internal stretch drawstring to customize the fit around the waist. Wear over your swimsuit, or pair with our exclusive Bahia 2/1mm Full Zip Jacket for more warmth and protection.
